mapper.insert:
insert into movie_tbl values (movie_seq.nextval, #{movieTitle}, #{movieDirector}, #{movieActor}, #{movieGenre}, #{movieTime}, #{movieDate}, #{movieRating}, #{movieContent}, #{filmSociety}, #{classicSociety}, #{specialMovie}, 'admin', #{movieType})
select max(movie_no) from movie_tbl
mapper.select: select movie_no as movieNo, movie_title as movieTitle, movie_director as movieDirector, movie_actor as movieActor, movie_genre as movieGenre, movie_time as movieTime, to_char(movie_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as movieDate, movie_rating as movieRating, movie_content as movieContent, film_society as filmSociety, classic_society as classicSociety, special_movie as specialMovie, enroll_member as enrollMember from movie_tbl

select movie_file_no as movieFileNo, movie_file_name as movieFileName, movie_file_path as movieFilePath, movie_file_category as movieFileCategory, movie_no as movieNo from movie_file where movie_file_category='메인' and movie_no=#{movieNo}

select movie_no as movieNo, movie_title as movieTitle, movie_director as movieDirector, movie_actor as movieActor, movie_genre as movieGenre, movie_time as movieTime, to_char(movie_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as movieDate, movie_rating as movieRating, movie_content as movieContent, film_society as filmSociety, classic_society as classicSociety, special_movie as specialMovie, enroll_member as enrollMember from movie_tbl where movie_no=#{movieNo}
select movie_video_no as videoNo, movie_video_link as videoLink from movie_video where movie_no=#{movieNo}
